contents.contents: Beneath the Hôtel-Dieu, there are lots of galleries whose walls are decorated with paintings.

question.contents: Do you know why these galleries were dug?
choices: To provide a passage towards other buildings
To shelter people in case of danger

explanations.contents: In the Middle Ages, Fuller’s earth was collected as an ingredient to make clothes.  Later, the galleries were used as a passage between different buildings and as secret places for meetings.
